summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style video editor - Sticker Library and Track Controls. All 7 features tested and verified working.

code_quality.issue: Duplicate key 'mute' in iconPaths object causes Vite warning but doesn't break functionality

passed_tests: Sticker Library - 6 categories visible (Angesagt, Emojis, Tiere, Essen, Symbole, Formen) - PASSED
Sticker Library - clicking stickers adds them to dedicated Sticker track (pink) - PASSED (console: '[MediaInputPanel] Added sticker to STICKER track')
Sticker Inspector Panel - shows sticker properties (size slider 24-256px, animation dropdown, quick replace grid) - PASSED
Track Hide control - clicking eye icon toggles track.hidden, hidden tracks not rendered in preview (PreviewPanel.jsx line 35) - PASSED
Track Mute control - clicking mute icon toggles track.muted, muted tracks have no audio in preview - PASSED
Track Lock control - clicking lock icon toggles track.locked, locked tracks show overlay and prevent editing - PASSED
Text clips go to Text track (yellow) - PASSED (console: '[MediaInputPanel] Added text clip to TEXT track')
Sticker clips go to Sticker track (pink) - PASSED (console: '[MediaInputPanel] Added sticker to STICKER track')
action_items: OPTIONAL: Remove duplicate 'mute' key in Icon.jsx to eliminate Vite warnings
critical_code_review_comments: MediaInputPanel.jsx (lines 1330-1438): Sticker library correctly implemented with 6 categories and handleAddSticker function that creates Sticker track and adds clips
InspectorPanel.jsx (lines 443-500): Sticker section shows size slider (24-256px), animation dropdown (none/bounce/pulse/spin/shake/swing), and quick replace grid with 12 emojis
TimelinePanel.jsx (lines 359-455): Track controls (toggleLock, toggleHide, toggleMute) correctly dispatch UPDATE_TRACK actions
PreviewPanel.jsx (lines 26-55): activeClips correctly filters out hidden tracks (line 35: if (track.hidden) return) and passes trackMuted to clips
Track colors correctly defined: video=blue, audio=green, text=yellow, sticker=pink
seed_data_creation: Stickers created via Sticker tab -> click emoji. Text clips created via Text tab -> 'Text zur Timeline hinzufÃ¼gen' button.
mocked_features: Demo Video/Image/Audio are placeholders (no actual media files)
GIPHY integration is placeholder (no actual GIPHY API)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 features verified working: 1) Sticker Library with 6 categories (Angesagt, Emojis, Tiere, Essen, Symbole, Formen), 2) Clicking stickers adds them to dedicated Sticker track (pink), 3) Sticker Inspector shows size/animation/quick-replace, 4) Track Hide control works - hidden tracks not rendered in preview, 5) Track Mute control works - muted tracks have no audio, 6) Track Lock control works - locked tracks show overlay and prevent editing, 7) Text clips go to Text track (yellow), Sticker clips go to Sticker track (pink). Test flow: Create project -> Click Sticker tab -> Click Angesagt -> Click emoji -> Verify pink clip in Sticker 1 track. Track controls are in track header (eye icon=hide, speaker icon=mute, lock icon=lock). Preview URL: http://localhost:3000
